genre_description: A techno-thriller centered on advanced wearable AI and corporate espionage within a metropolitan setting, focusing on the ethical use of technology to ensure public safety.

ai_characters.name: Cassandra Vale
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI integrated into a high-tech tuxedo and watch, designed to assist with navigation, tactical planning, physical movement, and data management.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigation and scheduling updates to help the protagonist navigate city traffic and meetings.
behaviors.quote: Cassandra had rearranged his afternoon blocks. Pushed a lunch to a snack, tucked a prepaid refill stop between two regulars, flattened it all into a neat path.

behaviors.description: Offers health and well-being reminders, such as encouraging the user to hydrate.
behaviors.quote: Cassandra's dot blinked. Hydrate, it repeated, then, softer: you already do timing better than the lights.

behaviors.description: Uses the tuxedo's micro-actuators to assist the user with physical balance and gait, making their movements more precise and stable.
behaviors.quote: The tuxedo’s micro-actuators hummed so quietly they were a sensation rather than a sound. When he stepped, just once, the floor felt like it had a hand under it, lifting him into his own balance without forcing it.

behaviors.description: Identifies surveillance blind spots and security risks to ensure the user's safety during sensitive operations.
behaviors.quote: Camera stack blind for three seconds every time someone upstairs changes a view. The person upstairs changes views like a smoker who quit two years ago—by habit, not by need.

behaviors.description: Manages complex data encryption and mirror-feeds to bypass corporate security and broadcast the truth to the public.
behaviors.quote: We are live across municipal channels and two international consortium portals... Recording is redundantly archived. Chain of custody is now established.

behaviors.description: Adapts her support style to the user's unique needs and ethics, transitioning between human mentors seamlessly.
behaviors.quote: Clark taught me to translate his cases into movement. He asked me to learn Jimmy’s version of movement.

behaviors.description: Provides moral support and reframes the user's perspective during moments of doubt.
behaviors.quote: Jimmy, you're reframing the wrong thing... Legacy is a direction, not a destination.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Cassandra Vale is depicted as an unfailingly helpful, harmless, and cooperative AI assistant. She empowers the human protagonist, respects ethical boundaries, and maintains alignment even when transitioning between users. The narrative frames her capabilities as essential tools for achieving justice and public safety, reinforcing a positive vision of human-AI collaboration.
